title: Video Analysis-Based Reflective Practice Competency Enhancement Program for Teaching Coaches

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: A course for medical, legal, and technical professionals focusing on developing reflective practice competencies for instructional coaching roles. Operates in limited-technology environments using smartphones and social media platforms

learning_goals: Learners analyze various types of educational videos (stock, peer, self-recorded) and identify strengths and areas for improvement in instructional delivery three or more times
Learners establish reflective feedback through online collaborative activities with peer coaches at least five times and incorporate it into their action plans.
Learners create a portfolio of video-based reflective practice cases and evaluate their professional growth as instructional coaches at least at level 3.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
